Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to contemporaneous registration and absentee ballot application.
Items.MatterName: Contemporaneous registration and absentee ballot application.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to creating an online voter information portal allowing absentee voters to track the status of their absentee application and ballot, allowing users to view their registration status and voting history and allowing users to access online resources related to voting
Items.MatterName: Ceating an online voter information portal allowing absentee voters to track the status of their absentee application and ballot.
